quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Character and Seinfeld
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, nickname. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which That 70s Show character had a regular job at the Foto Hut with Leo?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steven Hyde

questions.question: What is the name of the hot girl in season one of the show The Office?
Which character on the show The Office doesnt share the same first name as the actor who plays him/her?
Which character in the sitcom That 70s Show worked at the DMV?
Which character from That 70s Show wanted to start her own greeting card business?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Midge Pinciotti

questions.question: What is the first name of Mr. Peterman, Elaine Benes boss on the show Seinfeld?
Which character of That 70s Show became a policeman cadet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Kelso

questions.question: Which character in That 70s Show was afraid of spiders and had a dream sequence with him throwing womens panties in the air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eric Forman

questions.question: Which of these  Seinfeld actors was originally a real life NYC police officer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Barney Martin

questions.question: Name the two SNL characters played by Cheri Oteri and Will Ferrell who seemed to have a lot of extra spirit.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arianna and Craig

questions.question: In what year did Julia Louis-Dreyfus win an Emmy Award for her portrayal of Elaine Benes on the TV show Seinfeld?
Which character on Seinfeld was played by an actress whose name was Dizzy Lizzy?
Which is the only character on the show Seinfeld played by an Israeli-born actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Babu Bhatt

questions.question: What female character got a job at a radio station in That 70s Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donna Pinciotti

questions.question: What nickname did Julia Louis-Dreyfus get from her Seinfeld co-stars?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Little Yum-Yum

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Winner and Survivor

questions.question: Who was the winner of Survivor: The Amazon, which was filmed in 2002?

questions.question: Who was the winner of Survivor: Pearl Islands, the seventh installment of the reality show Survivor?

questions.question: Who was the winner of Survivor: All-Stars, that was set on the Pearl Islands of Panama?

questions.question: Who won Survivor: Borneo in 2000?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard Hatch

questions.question: This SNL on screen couple, often referred to as The Lovers, made everyone uncomfortable with a strange affection for meat and their equally strange love life.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Klarvins

questions.question: Adam Sandler did the character named The Richmeister on SNL.

questions.question: Who is Timmys evil babysitter in the animated series The Fairly OddParents?
Cartoon character Timmy Turner has a crush on a girl named Tuti.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Crocker

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Love and Flavor
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, timmy. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Where was the final episode of Flavor of Love, season 2 filmed?
The reality game show Flavor of Love has spin-offs.
The participants in Flavor of Love, season 2 threw a party for some of Flavs friends. Which of the following celebrities were guests of the party?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ying Yang Twins  G-Unit

questions.question: Timmy Turners fictional fairy god parents live as goldfish in Timmys room.
What is the occupation of Timys mom in the animated series The Fairly OddParents?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: real estate agent

questions.question: Flavor of Love, season 2 premiered in September 2006 and was watched by over 3 million viewers.
In the cartoon series The Fairly OddParents, which of Timmys friends wears braces?
Was dancing to hip-hop a task from episode 4 of Flavor of Love, season 2?

I am a Greys Anatomy character. Im in love with one of the surgical residents of Seattle Grace. Im very ambitious when it comes to surgery. I think of it like candy, but with blood which is so much cooler. Ive been known to be a slob. My best friend almost died. Who am I?
Which list contains the names of the five women eliminated at the end of episode one of Flavor of Love, season 2?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saaphyri, Bamma, Chocolate, Hood, H-Town

questions.question: I am a character from the TV show Greys Anatomy. I am the resident bad ass of the bunch. Ive been in trouble several times for my bedside manner, as I like to be honest with my patients. Ive slept with one of my fellow interns and also with one of the nurses here at Seattle Grace. Ive had Syphilis. Who am I?
What is the most distinctive feature of cartoon character Timmy Turner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: his big teeth

questions.question: What color tie does Timmys dad wear in the cartoon series The Fairly OddParents?
What are the names of Timmy Turners fairy godparents in the popular animated series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cosmo and Wanda

questions.question: Which of these people was not a contestant in Flavor of Love, season 2?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Interns and Seattle Grace
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, drama, screen. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In what year did Yogi Bear make his screen debut?

I am a character from the popular show Greys Anatomy. Im a surgical attending from New York. I have earned a reputation at Seattle Grace for being good-looking. Although I am a doctor, I prefer to live in my trailer as I have too much land and do not yet know what I want to do with it. I once saved the person I love from certain death. Who am I?

I am a surgical attending on Greys Anatomy who is dating one of the interns. I am very good at my job. I love listening to jazz music. I was shot once by a crazed gunman outside the hospital. Who am I?
What is Mariska Hargitays middle name?

I am a Greys Anatomy character. I am one of the more popular interns at Seattle Grace, because everyone seems to know me even if I dont know them. I live in a house with two of my fellow interns. Im in love with one of our surgical residents. My mother was a well known surgeon at Seattle Grace. I almost died. Who am I?

I am a character from the TV series Greys Anatomy. Im fairly new to Seattle Grace. When I first came here, I didnt have a place to live, so I set up shelter in the hospital basement. Once I got caught by the Chief, I was forced to move into a hotel. My family is very wealthy, but I kept it a secret and it almost cost me the love of my life. Who am I?
Who was Mariska Hargitays mother?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jayne Mansfield

questions.question: Where was Mariska Hargitay born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Santa Monica, California

questions.question: Mariska Hargitay has two half-sisters.

I am a Greys Anatomy character. I live in a big house with two other interns. I have been known to walk around in my underwear. I love to bake. I once posed for a lingerie ad to help pay my way through medical school. I fell in love with a heart transplant patient who left me millions of dollars when he died. Who am I?
What character did Mariska Hargitay play on Falcon Crest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carly Fixx

questions.question: I am a Greys Anatomy character. I am the least spoken of the group of interns here at Seattle Grace. I was secretly in love with one of my fellow interns for a long time. I was part of the Syphilis outbreak at the hospital. I used to live with two women. I once performed a life-saving surgery in an elevator. Who am I?

I am a surgical resident on the medical drama Greys Anatomy. I love having the power of authority. Ive earned the nickname the Nazi from fellow doctors and my interns. My son is named after one of my interns, and ever since he was born, Ive been told Ive become more lenient with my interns. Who am I?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Bailey

questions.question: Mariska Hargitays father died of cancer in 2006 at the age of 80. Mariska has said her greatest sadness is that she never got to thank him for all that he had done for her in his life.

I was not supposed to stay in Seattle, but I am now a permanent fixture at the hospital on the show Greys Anatomy. I came here from New York to try and rekindle and old relationship. I am one of five people up for the Chiefs job. Im also a very big flirt, and have slept with two of my co-workers. Who am I?
